# Advent of Code 2016 Day 2

## Part 1

```js
const code = `



`;

const p = {'L':-1, 'R':1, 'U': -3, 'D': 3};
var r = 0, k = 5, t;
for (var line of code.split('\n')) {
  for (var c of line) {
    t = k + p[c];
    if (t > 0 && t < 10 && (k * t) != 12 && (k * t) != 42) {
      k = t;
    }
  }
  console.log(k);
}

```

## Part 2

```js
const code = `



`;

const rules = {
	1: {D:3},
	2: {D:6, R:3},
	3: {D:7, R:4, U:1, L:2},
	4: {D:8, L:3},
	5: {R:6},
	6: {D:'A', R:7, U:2, L:5},
	7: {D:'B', R:8, U:3, L:6},
	8: {D:'C', R:9, U:4, L:7},
	9: {L:8},
	A: {R:'B', U:6},
	B: {D:'D', R:'C', U:7, L:'A'},
	C: {U:8, L:'B'},
	D: {U:'B'}
}

var k = 5;
for (var line of code.split('\n')) {
  for (var c of line) {
    if (rules[k][c]) {
      k = rules[k][c];
    }
  }
  console.log(k);
}
```
